onboarding.letsTakeFirstStep: Let's take the first step together
onboarding.title: What is Sentria?
onboarding.intro: Sentria is a community-powered platform built to support people during natural disasters. Whether you're reporting a flood, requesting help during a fire, or offering shelter after a storm — Sentria is your voice, your network, and your safety net. We believe connection can save lives.
onboarding.shareDescription: When disaster hits, timely information is critical. Sentria lets you post real-time updates about your surroundings — from damage reports to safe zones. Every post helps others stay alert and make informed decisions. Your voice can guide, protect, and even rescue.
onboarding.helpDescription: Need clean water? Got an extra blanket or power bank? Sentria makes it easy to ask for help — or lend a hand. You can browse nearby requests and offers, making community support more accessible and organized when it matters most.
onboarding.rebuildDescription: After the storm, the journey continues. Sentria supports long-term recovery by keeping people connected — to services, to aid, and to each other. You’re not alone. Together, we can rise, rebuild, and restore stronger than before.
